ComicInfo.Title: Flight 12; I Still Think of You Jim Henson
ComicInfo.Summary:
Flight 12 Cerebus and his other self rejoin together. Later he appears to Astoria and Cirin from a slit then disappears. The Roach turns into Loboroach, Venomroach and Ghostroach, then finds his queen. The Pigts are stopped.
Cynical Cerebus (a pin-up by Matt Feazell)
I Still Think of You Jim Henson (with Bert and Ernie / by Chris Aubry)
